title: Launching Summer 2023
content:
There isn't much to say right now! But thanks for checking out our blog section!

We are hard at working creating the cleanest & easiest to use competition directory and aim to release in the summertime!

In the mean time, you can sign up on our home page to recieve updates as we develop the site! Who knows, you may even provide a great piece of advice that ends up changing the site!
